hero.description: Essential methods and patterns for DSA interviews. Copy, learn, and ace your technical interviews ðŸš€
hero.helpBtnAria: Open help dialog with instructions on how to use this website

instruction1.title: Browse Methods by Category
instruction1.desc: Use the navigation links at the top to jump to different sections: Arrays, Strings, Objects, Map, Set, Math, Patterns, and Reference.

instruction2.title: Copy Code Examples
instruction2.desc: Hover over any code block to reveal the Copy button. Click it to copy the entire code snippet to your clipboard.

instruction3.title: Learn Method Details
instruction3.desc: Hover over any highlighted method name (like push(), map(), etc.) to see a tooltip with a description and a link to the official MDN documentation.

instruction4.title: Understand Complexity
instruction4.desc: Check the colored badges on each card to see time complexity (O(1), O(n), O(n log n), etc.) and whether methods mutate the original array or return a new one.

instruction5.title: Quick Reference Table
instruction5.desc: Scroll to the bottom to see the Quick Reference table with time complexities and use cases for all major methods and patterns.

instruction6.title: Practice DSA Patterns
instruction6.desc: Explore the DSA Patterns section for common interview patterns like Two Pointers, Sliding Window, Binary Search, and Graph Traversal with ready-to-use code examples.

code.arrays.adding: const arr = [1, 2, 3]; arr.push(4); // [1, 2, 3, 4] arr.pop(); // [1, 2, 3], returns 4 arr.unshift(0); // [0, 1, 2, 3] arr.shift(); // [1, 2, 3], returns 0 arr.splice(1, 1, 'a'); // [1, 'a', 3]
code.arrays.searching: const nums = [10, 20, 30, 20]; nums.indexOf(20); // 1 nums.lastIndexOf(20); // 3 nums.includes(30); // true nums.find(x => x > 15); // 20 nums.findIndex(x => x > 15); // 1
code.arrays.transforming: [1, 2, 3].map(x => x * 2); // [2, 4, 6] [1, 2, 3, 4].filter(x => x % 2 === 0); // [2, 4] [1, 2, 3].reduce((sum, x) => sum + x, 0); // 6 [[1, 2], [3, [4]]].flat(2); // [1, 2, 3, 4]
code.arrays.sorting: const unsorted = [3, 1, 4, 1, 5]; unsorted.sort((a, b) => a - b); // ascending unsorted.sort((a, b) => b - a); // descending const letters = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd']; letters.slice(1, 3); // ['b', 'c'] letters.concat(['e']); // ['a','b','c','d','e'] letters.join('-'); // 'a-b-c-d'
code.arrays.iteration: [1, 2, 3].every(x => x > 0); // true (all pass) [1, 2, 3].some(x => x > 2); // true (any passes) Array.from('abc'); // ['a','b','c'] Array.from({length: 3}, (_, i) => i); // [0, 1, 2] [...new Set([1, 1, 2])]; // [1, 2]
code.strings.accessing: const str = 'hello'; str[0]; // 'h' str.charAt(1); // 'e' str.charCodeAt(0); // 104 'javascript'.indexOf('script'); // 4 'hello world'.includes('world'); // true 'filename.js'.startsWith('file'); // true 'filename.js'.endsWith('.js'); // true
code.strings.extracting: 'hello world'.slice(0, 5); // 'hello' 'hello world'.split(' '); // ['hello', 'world'] 'a,b,c'.split(','); // ['a', 'b', 'c'] 'Hello'.toLowerCase(); // 'hello' ' trim me '.trim(); // 'trim me' 'foo bar'.replace('bar', 'baz');// 'foo baz' 'ha'.repeat(3); // 'hahaha' '5'.padStart(3, '0'); // '005'
code.strings.regex: 'test123'.match(/d+/); // ['123'] 'abc123def456'.match(/d+/g); // ['123', '456'] 'hello'.search(/l+/); // 2 'a1b2c3'.replace(/d/g, 'X'); // 'aXbXcX'
code.objects.methods: const obj = { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 }; Object.keys(obj); // ['a', 'b', 'c'] Object.values(obj); // [1, 2, 3] Object.entries(obj); // [['a',1], ['b',2], ['c',3]] Object.fromEntries([['x', 10], ['y', 20]]); // {x:10, y:20} obj.hasOwnProperty('a'); // true 'a' in obj; // true const clone = { ...obj }; const merged = Object.assign({}, obj, { d: 4 }); delete obj.c; // removes property c
code.map.basic: const map = new Map(); map.set('name', 'Burak'); map.set('age', 25); map.set({ id: 1 }, 'object key'); // any type as key map.get('name'); // 'Burak' map.has('age'); // true map.size; // 3 map.delete('age'); // Iteration for (const [key, value] of map) { console.log(key, value); } // From/To object const fromObj = new Map(Object.entries({ a: 1 })); const toObj = Object.fromEntries(map);
code.set.basic: const set = new Set([1, 2, 2, 3]); // {1, 2, 3} set.add(4); // {1, 2, 3, 4} set.has(2); // true set.delete(1); // {2, 3, 4} set.size; // 3 // Remove duplicates const unique = [...new Set([1, 1, 2, 2, 3])]; // [1,2,3] // Set operations const a = new Set([1, 2, 3]); const b = new Set([2, 3, 4]); const union = new Set([...a, ...b]); // {1,2,3,4} const intersect = new Set([...a].filter(x => b.has(x))); // {2,3} const diff = new Set([...a].filter(x => !b.has(x))); // {1}
code.math.methods: Math.max(1, 5, 3); // 5 Math.min(...[1, 5, 3]); // 1 (spread for arrays) Math.abs(-5); // 5 Math.floor(3.7); // 3 Math.ceil(3.2); // 4 Math.round(3.5); // 4 Math.trunc(-3.7); // -3 Math.sqrt(16); // 4 Math.pow(2, 3); // 8 (or 2 ** 3) // Random int in range [min, max] Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min;
code.math.number: Number.isInteger(5); // true Number.isNaN(NaN); // true Number.isFinite(100); // true parseInt('42px'); // 42 parseInt('1010', 2); // 10 (binary) parseFloat('3.14'); // 3.14 // BigInt for large numbers const big = 9007199254740991n + 1n;
code.patterns.stack: // Stack (LIFO) const stack = []; stack.push(1); // [1] stack.push(2); // [1, 2] stack.pop(); // 2, stack is [1] stack[stack.length - 1]; // peek: 1 // Queue (FIFO) - simple O(n) dequeue const queue = []; queue.push(1); // enqueue queue.push(2); queue.shift(); // dequeue: 1
code.patterns.frequency: function charFrequency(str) { const freq = new Map(); for (const char of str) { freq.set(char, (freq.get(char) || 0) + 1); } return freq; } charFrequency('hello'); // Map { 'h'=>1, 'e'=>1, 'l'=>2, 'o'=>1 }
code.patterns.twopointers: // Palindrome Check function isPalindrome(s) { let left = 0, right = s.length - 1; while (left < right) { if (s[left] !== s[right]) return false; left++; right--; } return true; } // Two Sum (sorted array) function twoSumSorted(arr, target) { let left = 0, right = arr.length - 1; while (left < right) { const sum = arr[left] + arr[right]; if (sum === target) return [left, right]; if (sum < target) left++; else right--; } return [-1, -1]; }
code.patterns.sliding: // Max Sum of K consecutive elements function maxSumSubarray(arr, k) { let windowSum = 0; for (let i = 0; i < k; i++) windowSum += arr[i]; let maxSum = windowSum; for (let i = k; i < arr.length; i++) { windowSum += arr[i] - arr[i - k]; maxSum = Math.max(maxSum, windowSum); } return maxSum; }
code.patterns.binary: function binarySearch(arr, target) { let lo = 0, hi = arr.length - 1; while (lo <= hi) { const mid = Math.floor((lo + hi) / 2); if (arr[mid] === target) return mid; if (arr[mid] < target) lo = mid + 1; else hi = mid - 1; } return -1; }
code.patterns.bfs: function bfs(graph, start) { const visited = new Set([start]); const queue = [start]; while (queue.length > 0) { const node = queue.shift(); for (const neighbor of graph[node] || []) { if (!visited.has(neighbor)) { visited.add(neighbor); queue.push(neighbor); } } } return visited; }
code.patterns.dfs: function dfs(graph, start, visited = new Set()) { visited.add(start); for (const neighbor of graph[start] || []) { if (!visited.has(neighbor)) { dfs(graph, neighbor, visited); } } return visited; }

code.arrays.adding: const arr = [1, 2, 3]; arr.push(4); // [1, 2, 3, 4] arr.pop(); // [1, 2, 3], 4 dÃ¶ndÃ¼rÃ¼r arr.unshift(0); // [0, 1, 2, 3] arr.shift(); // [1, 2, 3], 0 dÃ¶ndÃ¼rÃ¼r arr.splice(1, 1, 'a'); // [1, 'a', 3]
code.arrays.searching: const nums = [10, 20, 30, 20]; nums.indexOf(20); // 1 nums.lastIndexOf(20); // 3 nums.includes(30); // true nums.find(x => x > 15); // 20 nums.findIndex(x => x > 15); // 1
code.arrays.transforming: [1, 2, 3].map(x => x * 2); // [2, 4, 6] [1, 2, 3, 4].filter(x => x % 2 === 0); // [2, 4] [1, 2, 3].reduce((sum, x) => sum + x, 0); // 6 [[1, 2], [3, [4]]].flat(2); // [1, 2, 3, 4]
code.arrays.sorting: const unsorted = [3, 1, 4, 1, 5]; unsorted.sort((a, b) => a - b); // artan unsorted.sort((a, b) => b - a); // azalan const letters = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd']; letters.slice(1, 3); // ['b', 'c'] letters.concat(['e']); // ['a','b','c','d','e'] letters.join('-'); // 'a-b-c-d'
code.arrays.iteration: [1, 2, 3].every(x => x > 0); // true (hepsi geÃ§er) [1, 2, 3].some(x => x > 2); // true (herhangi biri geÃ§er) Array.from('abc'); // ['a','b','c'] Array.from({length: 3}, (_, i) => i); // [0, 1, 2] [...new Set([1, 1, 2])]; // [1, 2]
code.strings.accessing: const str = 'hello'; str[0]; // 'h' str.charAt(1); // 'e' str.charCodeAt(0); // 104 'javascript'.indexOf('script'); // 4 'hello world'.includes('world'); // true 'filename.js'.startsWith('file'); // true 'filename.js'.endsWith('.js'); // true
code.strings.extracting: 'hello world'.slice(0, 5); // 'hello' 'hello world'.split(' '); // ['hello', 'world'] 'a,b,c'.split(','); // ['a', 'b', 'c'] 'Hello'.toLowerCase(); // 'hello' ' trim me '.trim(); // 'trim me' 'foo bar'.replace('bar', 'baz');// 'foo baz' 'ha'.repeat(3); // 'hahaha' '5'.padStart(3, '0'); // '005'
code.strings.regex: 'test123'.match(/d+/); // ['123'] 'abc123def456'.match(/d+/g); // ['123', '456'] 'hello'.search(/l+/); // 2 'a1b2c3'.replace(/d/g, 'X'); // 'aXbXcX'
code.objects.methods: const obj = { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 }; Object.keys(obj); // ['a', 'b', 'c'] Object.values(obj); // [1, 2, 3] Object.entries(obj); // [['a',1], ['b',2], ['c',3]] Object.fromEntries([['x', 10], ['y', 20]]); // {x:10, y:20} obj.hasOwnProperty('a'); // true 'a' in obj; // true const clone = { ...obj }; const merged = Object.assign({}, obj, { d: 4 }); delete obj.c; // c Ã¶zelliÄŸini kaldÄ±rÄ±r
code.map.basic: const map = new Map(); map.set('name', 'Burak'); map.set('age', 25); map.set({ id: 1 }, 'object key'); // herhangi bir tip anahtar map.get('name'); // 'Burak' map.has('age'); // true map.size; // 3 map.delete('age'); // Yineleme for (const [key, value] of map) { console.log(key, value); } // Nesneden/nesneye const fromObj = new Map(Object.entries({ a: 1 })); const toObj = Object.fromEntries(map);
code.set.basic: const set = new Set([1, 2, 2, 3]); // {1, 2, 3} set.add(4); // {1, 2, 3, 4} set.has(2); // true set.delete(1); // {2, 3, 4} set.size; // 3 // TekrarlarÄ± kaldÄ±r const unique = [...new Set([1, 1, 2, 2, 3])]; // [1,2,3] // Set iÅŸlemleri const a = new Set([1, 2, 3]); const b = new Set([2, 3, 4]); const union = new Set([...a, ...b]); // {1,2,3,4} const intersect = new Set([...a].filter(x => b.has(x))); // {2,3} const diff = new Set([...a].filter(x => !b.has(x))); // {1}
code.math.methods: Math.max(1, 5, 3); // 5 Math.min(...[1, 5, 3]); // 1 (diziler iÃ§in yayma) Math.abs(-5); // 5 Math.floor(3.7); // 3 Math.ceil(3.2); // 4 Math.round(3.5); // 4 Math.trunc(-3.7); // -3 Math.sqrt(16); // 4 Math.pow(2, 3); // 8 (veya 2 ** 3) // [min, max] aralÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda rastgele tam sayÄ± Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min;
code.math.number: Number.isInteger(5); // true Number.isNaN(NaN); // true Number.isFinite(100); // true parseInt('42px'); // 42 parseInt('1010', 2); // 10 (ikili) parseFloat('3.14'); // 3.14 // BÃ¼yÃ¼k sayÄ±lar iÃ§in BigInt const big = 9007199254740991n + 1n;
code.patterns.stack: // YÄ±ÄŸÄ±n (LIFO) const stack = []; stack.push(1); // [1] stack.push(2); // [1, 2] stack.pop(); // 2, yÄ±ÄŸÄ±n [1] stack[stack.length - 1]; // peek: 1 // Kuyruk (FIFO) - basit O(n) dequeue const queue = []; queue.push(1); // enqueue queue.push(2); queue.shift(); // dequeue: 1
code.patterns.frequency: function charFrequency(str) { const freq = new Map(); for (const char of str) { freq.set(char, (freq.get(char) || 0) + 1); } return freq; } charFrequency('hello'); // Map { 'h'=>1, 'e'=>1, 'l'=>2, 'o'=>1 }
code.patterns.twopointers: // Palindrom KontrolÃ¼ function isPalindrome(s) { let left = 0, right = s.length - 1; while (left < right) { if (s[left] !== s[right]) return false; left++; right--; } return true; } // Ä°ki Toplam (sÄ±ralÄ± dizi) function twoSumSorted(arr, target) { let left = 0, right = arr.length - 1; while (left < right) { const sum = arr[left] + arr[right]; if (sum === target) return [left, right]; if (sum < target) left++; else right--; } return [-1, -1]; }
code.patterns.sliding: // K ardÄ±ÅŸÄ±k Ã¶ÄŸenin maksimum toplamÄ± function maxSumSubarray(arr, k) { let windowSum = 0; for (let i = 0; i < k; i++) windowSum += arr[i]; let maxSum = windowSum; for (let i = k; i < arr.length; i++) { windowSum += arr[i] - arr[i - k]; maxSum = Math.max(maxSum, windowSum); } return maxSum; }
code.patterns.binary: function binarySearch(arr, target) { let lo = 0, hi = arr.length - 1; while (lo <= hi) { const mid = Math.floor((lo + hi) / 2); if (arr[mid] === target) return mid; if (arr[mid] < target) lo = mid + 1; else hi = mid - 1; } return -1; }
code.patterns.bfs: function bfs(graph, start) { const visited = new Set([start]); const queue = [start]; while (queue.length > 0) { const node = queue.shift(); for (const neighbor of graph[node] || []) { if (!visited.has(neighbor)) { visited.add(neighbor); queue.push(neighbor); } } } return visited; }
code.patterns.dfs: function dfs(graph, start, visited = new Set()) { visited.add(start); for (const neighbor of graph[start] || []) { if (!visited.has(neighbor)) { dfs(graph, neighbor, visited); } } return visited; }
